# start

**Instance Property**

The start of a range of text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var start: UITextPosition { get }
```

## Discussion

Compute and store in this property the UITextPosition object representing the start of a range of text.

## Defining Ranges of Text

- **end**: The end of the range of text.
- **isEmpty**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the range of text represented by the receiver is zero-length.
